name: site2
description: **I'm not using this theme anymore.** **New maintainer wanted**

scripts.deploy: npm run build && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix public master`:master --force
scripts.prod: rm -rf ./public && npm run build && npm run compile && cd ./public && python -m SimpleHTTPServer
scripts.prod-no-compile: rm -rf ./public && npm run build && cd ./public && python -m SimpleHTTPServer
